00033 corelib::corelib(bool _GUI_MODE)
00034 {
00035     // Setting gui mode, if false - cli mode else gui mode
00036     this->_GUI_MODE=_GUI_MODE;
00037 }

00039 corelib* createCoreLib(bool _GUI_MODE){

00043 QList<QStringList> corelib::getWineProcessList(){
00044     QList<QStringList> proclist;
00045     QStringList procline;
00046 
00047     QString name, procstat, path, prefix, env_arg, nice;
00048 
00049     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00050         QString message = "<p>Process is unable access to /proc file system.</p><p>Access is necessary for displaying wine process information.</p><p>You need to set CONFIG_PROC_FS=y option on linux kernel config file and mount proc file system by running: mount -t proc none /proc</p>";
00051     #endif
00052 
00053     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00054         QString message = "<p>Process is unable access to /proc file system.</p><p>Access is necessary for displaying wine process information.</p><p>You need to set PSEUDOFS and PROCFS option on FreeBSD kernel config file and mount proc file system by running: mount -t procfs proc /proc</p>";
00055     #endif
00056 
00057     // Check for /proc directory exists
00058     QDir dir("/proc");
00059     if (!dir.exists()){
00060     if (this->showError(message, false) == QMessageBox::Ignore){
00061         procline << "-1";
00062         proclist << procline;
00063             return proclist;
00064         }
00065     }
00066 
00067     /* On Linux:
00068      * This is new engine for getting process info from /proc directory
00069      * its fully wrighted with QT and might work more stable =)
00070      */
00071     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00072         dir.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00073         dir.setSorting(QDir::Name);
00074 
00075         QFileInfoList list = dir.entryInfoList();
00076 
00077         // Getting directoryes one by one
00078         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00079             QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00080             path = "/proc/";
00081             path.append(fileInfo.fileName());
00082             path.append("/stat");
00083             QFile file(path);
00084             // Try to read stat file
00085             if (file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)){
00086                 QTextStream in(&file);
00087                 QString line = in.readLine();
00088                 if (!line.isNull()){
00089                      // Getting nice and name of the process
00090                      nice = line.section(' ', 18, 18);
00091                      name = line.section(' ', 1, 1);
00092                      name.remove(QChar('('));
00093                      name.remove(QChar(')'));
00094                      name = name.toLower();
00095 
00096                     // If name contains wine or .exe and not contains q4wine,
00097                     // then we try to get environ variables.
00098                     if ((name.contains("wine") || name.contains(".exe")) && !name.contains(APP_SHORT_NAME)){
00099                         path = "/proc/";
00100                         path.append(fileInfo.fileName());
00101                         path.append("/environ");
00102                         QFile e_file(path);
00103 
00104                         // Getting WINEPREFIX variable.
00105                         if (e_file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)){
00106                             QTextStream e_in(&e_file);
00107                             QString e_line = e_in.readLine();
00108                             int index = e_line.indexOf("WINEPREFIX=");
00109                             prefix="";
00110                             if (index!=-1)
00111                                 for (int i=index+11; i<=e_line.length(); i++){
00112                                      if (e_line.mid(i, 1).data()->isPrint()){
00113                                            prefix.append(e_line.mid(i, 1));
00114                                      } else {
00115                                            break;
00116                                      }
00117                                 }
00118                         }
00119 
00120                         // Puting all fields into QList<QStringList>
00121                         procline.clear();
00122                         procline << fileInfo.fileName() << name << nice << prefix;
00123                         proclist << procline;
00124 
00125                     }
00126                 }
00127             file.close();
00128             }
00129         }
00130         #endif
00131 
00132         /* On FreeBSD:
00133          * This is new engine for getting process info from /proc directory and kmem interface
00134          */
00135         #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00136             kvm_t *kd;
00137         int cntproc, i, ni, ipid;
00138 
00139             struct kinfo_proc *kp;
00140             char buf[_POSIX2_LINE_MAX];
00141             char **envs;
00142 
00143             kd = kvm_openfiles(_PATH_DEVNULL, _PATH_DEVNULL, NULL, O_RDONLY, buf);
00144                 if (!kd){
00145             if (this->showError(QObject::tr("<p>It seems q4wine can not run kvm_openfiles.</p>"), false) == QMessageBox::Ignore){
00146                         procline << "-1";
00147                         proclist << procline;
00148                         return proclist;
00149                     }
00150                     return proclist;
00151                 }
00152             kp = kvm_getprocs(kd, KERN_PROC_ALL, 0, &cntproc);
00153                 if (!kp){
00154             if (this->showError(QObject::tr("<p>It seems q4wine can not run kvm_getprocs.</p>"), false) == QMessageBox::Ignore){
00155                         procline << "-1";
00156                         proclist << procline;
00157                         return proclist;
00158                     }
00159                     return proclist;
00160                 }
00161 
00162             QStringList cur_pids;
00163             for (i=0; i<cntproc;i++){
00164                 prefix="";
00165                 ipid = kp[i].ki_pid;
00166 
00167                 if (cur_pids.indexOf(QObject::tr("%1").arg(ipid))==-1){
00168                     cur_pids << QObject::tr("%1").arg(ipid);
00169                     name = kp[i].ki_comm;
00170 
00171                     if ((name.contains("wine") || name.contains(".exe")) && !name.contains(APP_SHORT_NAME)){
00172                          ni = kp[i].ki_nice;
00173                          nice = QObject::tr("%1").arg(ni);
00174 
00175                          if (name.contains("pthread")){
00176                               envs = kvm_getargv(kd, (const struct kinfo_proc *) &(kp[i]), 0);
00177                               if (envs){
00178                                     name = envs[0];
00179                                     if (name.isEmpty()){
00180                                          name = kp[i].ki_comm;
00181                                     } else {
00182                                          name = name.split('\\').last();
00183                                     }
00184                                }
00185                           }
00186 
00187                           envs = kvm_getenvv(kd, (const struct kinfo_proc *) &(kp[i]), 0);
00188                           if (envs){
00189                                 int j=0;
00190                                 while (envs[j]){
00191                                      env_arg=envs[j];
00192                                      int index = env_arg.indexOf("WINEPREFIX=");
00193                                      if (index>=0){
00194                                            prefix=env_arg.mid(11);
00195                                            break;
00196                                      }
00197                                      j++;
00198                                 }
00199                           } else {
00200                                  prefix="";
00201                           }
00202 
00203                           // Puting all fields into QList<QStringList>
00204                           procline.clear();
00205                           procline << QObject::tr("%1").arg(ipid) << name << nice << prefix;
00206                           proclist << procline;
00207                      }
00208                 }
00209            }
00210         #endif
00211 
00212 
00213     return proclist;
00214 }
00215 
00216 QVariant corelib::getSetting(const QString group, const QString key, const bool checkExist, const QVariant defaultVal) const{
00217     QVariant retVal;
00218     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00219 
00220     settings.beginGroup(group);
00221     retVal = settings.value(key, defaultVal);
00222     settings.endGroup();
00223 
00224     if (checkExist==true)
00225     if (QFileInfo(retVal.toString()).exists()){
00226         this->showError(QObject::tr("<p>Error while loading application settings by key: '%1'. File or path not exists: \"%2\"</p><p>Please, go to %3 options dialog and set it.</p>").arg(key).arg(retVal.toString()).arg(APP_SHORT_NAME));
00227         retVal = QVariant();
00228     }
00229     return retVal;
00230 }
00231 
00232 int corelib::showError(const QString message, const bool info) const{
00233     switch (this->_GUI_MODE){
00234     case true:
00235         switch (info){
00236         case true:
00237             QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Error"), message);
00238             return 0;
00239         break;
00240         case false:
00241             return QMessageBox::warning(0, QObject::tr("Error"), message, QMessageBox::Retry, QMessageBox::Ignore);
00242         break;
00243         }
00244     break;
00245     case false:
00246         cout << "test"; // message.toLatin1();
00247     break;
00248     }
00249     return 0;
00250 }
